How we will work with you

Painting production process

You send us a photo and additional instructions

We prepare design options according to your requirements

You pick a layout and the painter starts to wokrk

You pick a frame option and design

We agree on address and comfortable delivery time

You pay the rest of the agreed sum via delivery worker when recieving the painting

Frame design

We can offer you any frame design from a wide variety of options.

Frequently asked questions

We'll answer your every question

How much time is needed for completing an order?

The completion time depends on three factors: the complexity of the painting, the style of the painting, and the painting size. The average completion time is 7 days without the delivery. In some cases, the time can be shortened to 5 days.

Notice: if you decide to change something in the painting - it can take additional time, which is not a part of the initial agreement.

Will I be able to see the painting before recieving it?

Yes. As soon as it's ready, we send a digital photo of your painting via email, so you can make any changes or adjustments, if such are present. You can also see the painting "live" in our office.

What the required format of the photos?

We work with all known image formats! On the website you can upload JPEG, TIFF, PNG up to 50 Mb in size. You must own the image, or have permission to use the image. If you have a different image format (RAW, PDF), you can use our FTP uploader. If you want to make a portrait from a paper photo (not digital), send it to us, we'll scan it, and return it with your order!

Can I give specific instructions to the painter?

When you place your order on the website, you can add comments in a special text field. You can also: join objects from different photos into one, or remove objects from a photo, you can change the background, change clothes, outfits, make a colored photo black and white, or order a painting from a damaged or old photo.

Just send us a photo and

We'll send you a layout for free in the next hour!
